testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Exception in test #1
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: No enum constant machine.State. at java.base/java.lang.Enum.valueOf(Enum.java:240) at machine.State.valueOf(CoffeeMachine.java:5) at machine.CoffeeMachine.main(CoffeeMachine.java:172)
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Write action (buy, fill, take, remaining, exit): > remaining The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups $550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take, remaining, exit): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino, back - to main menu: > 2 Write action (buy, fill, take, remaining, exit): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino, back - to main menu: > 2 Sorry, not enough water! I have enough resources, making you a coffee!
